analysis_disability: The phrase "Must be physically fit" without explicitly stating the physical requirements will discourage people who may be physically able for the role.
text: I am currently looking for a Clean Environment Driver to assist the Local Authority in Preston. Duties. Your duty will be keeping the streets of Preston clean and free from waste, sometimes alone or as part of a team. This may include picking up litter, emptying bins etc. You will be required to drive from time to time. However, it is primarily labouring. Experience. Ideally you will have experience in a labouring position before, although this is not essential. Driving licence is required. Must be physically fit. Must be happy/adaptable to work in all weather conditions. Please apply for this position using the link, alternatively if you’d like to discuss it before applying, please contact Katie. BRN Recruitment are a specialist multi-sector recruitment agency, dealing with both temporary and permanent placements throughout the UK into both the public and private sectors.
